FriendlyName: How your plugin will show up in the Plugins list.
This text is shown on the right side in the plugin details panel in a scrollable text box.
You can use links here, players can click on them! For example add a Discord invite.
Don't touch the SourceDirectories, unless you rename or consolidate your projects inside the solution.
